pageContext.geocode_address: 1937 W Cornwallis Rd, Durham, NC 27705, USA
pageContext.public_note: *Registration open January 23rd for members and February 4th for general public
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Take on Gotham's villains by designing and building Batman's favorite crime-fighting machines!  Build the Bat Tumbler, craft a Batwing, and design your very own Batcave, all out of LEGO® materials.  Then use your projects to help save the city.  Be the super-hero or super-heroine Gotham needs while learning how the world works through STEM concepts!
pageContext.course_type_name: Batmans Gotham Gadgets with LEGO® Materials
